title: AIML - Machine Learning Engineer/Scientist, Siri Information Intelligence
summary: The AIML Information Intelligence team is creating groundbreaking technology for artificial intelligence, machine learning and natural language processing. Our universal search engine powers search features across a variety of Apple products and develops state-of-the-art generative AI technologies.
description: As a member of our fast-paced group, you’ll have the unique and rewarding opportunity to shape upcoming products from Apple. This role will involve analyzing search ranking and relevance requirements, developing, fine-tuning, and evaluating domain-specific Large Language Models, conducting applied research, building machine-learned models for search relevance, ranking and query understanding problems, and more.
key_qualifications: Experience in machine learning, deep learning, information retrieval, natural language processing or data mining. Proficiency in Python, Go, Java, C++. Excellent knowledge and good practical skills in major machine learning algorithms. Good interpersonal skills and team player.
education_experience: MS or PhD in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Information Retrieval, Data Science or related field
additional_requirements: Nice to have: Experience with Large Scale Data-Mining and/or Machine learning, Experience in Web Crawling, Experience with ML and LLM model inference optimization
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay for this role ranges between $135,400 and $250,600. Apart from base pay, employees have other benefits such as stock options, comprehensive medical and dental coverage, retirement benefits, discounted products and free services, educational reimbursement, discretionary bonuses or commission payments, and relocation.
